/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in hues of red and orange, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. On the right side of the image, a blue sign stands out, although the text on it is not visible in the image. The overall scene is a vibrant snapshot of urban life in Beijing.
